Onderwerp: Re: [NIHONTO] Great Rai sword for sale


After an all-too-short sabbatical, I check my mail, and oh-my~~it was
great to see your post and the attached link.  Nice site, good sword.
Thanks for posting it.  Maybe we all need a little "shaking up-waking
up" with some new information from time to time.
 
Ken 
(still moving and shaking, but sometimes I forget why....)

Richard Turner <ikkanshi@...> wrote:

All, there is an excellent Nakajima-Rai Katana from the Nambokucho
period with NBTHK Tokubetsu Hozon papers on the Nihonto Trader at the
moment being offered by Matt Hoyle. It's at a pretty cool price too. 

Take a look. 


Rich
